mapper.select: select pr.*, p.pname, p.options, p.category1, p.category2, p.category3 from (select pr.*, pb.title from payrequest pr left outer join proboard pb on pr.pbno = pb.pbno where pr.customer = #{customer} and pr.status = '결제진행' ) pr left outer join production p on pr.pno = p.pno order by p.pno
select payno from payment where customer = #{customer} and status = '결제진행'
